title: 148863551.is It Legible
excerpt: I picked up a notebook I had in my backpack the other day.

children.text: I picked up a notebook I had in my backpack the other day.
I couldn’t read anything I wrote. My handwriting was illegible.
Most of the work we do (as knowledge workers) is focused the crafting the message; transmitting particulars and having something to say.
And too often we forget that the medium is the message…that
we do the work or tell the story or record the message, matters just as much.
